articles.description: The EU and UK have agreed to diplomatic “reset” in relations after the bloc threatened to override part of the Northern Ireland agreement on Brexit in order to restrict coronavirus vaccine exports.
articles.content:
PM wants world to get vaccine at same time
Boris Johnson has said he wants Europe and the rest of the world to receive vaccinations at the same time as the UK, saying theres no point one country on … [+821 chars]
